title: Japanese Government MEXT Research Scholar
description: Selected as a prestigious MEXT Research Scholar through Embassy Recommendation.

title: Innovation Ambassador
organization: Ministry of Education, Government of India
description: Selected as one of the Innovation Ambassadors at the Ministry of Education’s Innovation Cell. Worked on enhancing mentorship skills and contributing to innovation and entrepreneurship awareness.

title: Finalist, National Innovation Contest 2020
organization: Ministry of Education, Government of India
description: Secured a position among the top 10 finalists out of 30,000+ submissions in the NIC 2020 contest.

title: 2nd Runner Up, National Level IoT Challenge 2019
description: Developed and demonstrated an IoT-based AgriTech solution for autonomous agricultural monitoring.
